meanings.sent1: I picked a tiny cymling from the garden for our salad.
meanings.sent2: The farmer harvested the cymling to sell at the market.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel mistook the cymling for a toy and rolled it around.
meanings.sent4: The cymling, with its vibrant green color, stood out among the other vegetables.
meanings.sent5: The children were amazed by the cute cymling growing in the vegetable patch.

meanings.sent1: As a cymling in the workforce, she was eager to learn and grow.
meanings.sent2: The camp counselor guided the cymling through their first overnight trip.
meanings.sent3: The cymling chef accidentally added salt instead of sugar to the cake batter.
meanings.sent4: In the vast world of music, the young cymling found his passion for playing the guitar.
meanings.sent5: The wise old owl shared stories of his youth with the curious cymling owl.
